title: MESSAGE : SENT: A Gay Short Story
description: Armando sends a rather indiscreet photo to a friend.But he makes a mistake and the photo ends up on Cicero's cell phone.What Cicero will do now that he has the photo is a question that Armando will need to deal with as quickly as possible.Homoerotic Contents â€“ For Adults Only.
